meanings.definition: The process of setting type for printing.
meanings.sent1: The typesettings were carefully arranged before the printing began.
meanings.sent2: The typesettings on the page were clear and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The typesettings decided to rebel and form a new font style.
meanings.sent4: Her typesettings were like a well-orchestrated symphony on the page.
meanings.sent5: The intricate typesettings danced across the paper, bringing the words to life.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of text and images on a printed page.
meanings.sent1: After adjusting the typesettings, the page looked more balanced.
meanings.sent2: The typesettings of the magazine were visually appealing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous typesettings played hide and seek on the page.
meanings.sent4: Her typesettings were a beautiful tapestry of words and images.
meanings.sent5: The typesettings created a harmonious flow on the printed page.

meanings.definition: The style or design of printed material.
meanings.sent1: His unique typesettings stood out among the other publications.
meanings.sent2: The typesettings of the brochure reflected a modern aesthetic.
meanings.sent3: The typesettings threw a party to celebrate their new look.
meanings.sent4: Her typesettings were a reflection of her artistic vision.
meanings.sent5: The striking typesettings captured the attention of every reader.
